cd /media/sam/1TB/UTXOracle && GH_TOKEN=$(gh auth token) python3 -c "
from pathlib import Path
import sys
sys.path.insert(0, '/home/sam/.claude/scripts')
from roadmaptoissues import parse_roadmap
from github_sync_core import get_existing_milestones, ensure_milestone_exists

phases, plans = parse_roadmap(Path('.planning/ROADMAP.md'))
print(f'Found {len(phases)} phases')

existing = get_existing_milestones()
print(f'Existing milestones: {existing}')

for phase in phases:
    milestone_title = f'Phase {phase.number}: {phase.name}'
    print(f'Creating: {milestone_title}')
    num = ensure_milestone_exists(milestone_title, phase.goal or f'Phase {phase.number}', dry_run=True)
    print(f'Result: {num}')
" 2>&1

print(f'Stderr: {result.stderr[:500] if result.stderr else \"empty\"}')
" 2>&1

grep -A 20 "## 1. BEFORE" ~/.claude/commands/gsd/execute-phase-sync.md | head -25

echo "=== /gsd:pipeline ===" && grep -E "mcp__claude-flow|claude.flow" ~/.claude/commands/gsd/pipeline.md | head -10 && echo "" && echo "=== /spec-pipeline ===" && grep -E "mcp__claude-flow|claude.flow|ClaudeFlow" ~/.claude/commands/spec-pipeline.md | head -10
grep -n "allowed-tools" -A 20 ~/.claude/commands/spec-pipeline.md | head -25
head -50 ~/.claude/commands/spec-pipeline.md
ls -la ~/.claude/commands/spec-pipeline.md ~/.claude/scripts/spec_pipeline.py 2>/dev/null && echo "---" && head -5 ~/.claude/scripts/spec_pipeline.py 2>/dev/null
operations.description: Check spec-pipeline creation date and script
